pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
<#if preferences.subsidiaries> <#if subsidiary.legalname?length != 0> ${subsidiary.legalname} <#else> ${subsidiary.name}<#if companyinformation.legalname?length != 0> ${companyinformation.legalname} <#else> ${companyinformation.companyname} </#if> </#if>
<#if preferences.subsidiaries> ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text} <#else> ${companyinformation.addresstext} </#if>
<#if !paymentlinktext.printinginhtml><#else></#if>
<#if !paymentlinktext.printinginhtml><#assign br_string="
"><#assign comma_space_string=", ">
${paymentlinktext.contactinfoheader}
${paymentlinktext.emaillabel}${(preferences.subsidiaries)?then(subsidiary.email, companyinformation.email)}
${paymentlinktext.phonelabel}${(preferences.subsidiaries)?then(subsidiary.fax, companyinformation.fax)}
<#if record.paymentlink?length != 0>
${paymentlinktext.paymentlinkheader}
${paymentlinktext.paymentlinkfootertext} </#if>
<#if preferences.subsidiaries><#if subsidiary.legalname?length != 0>${subsidiary.legalname}, <#else> ${subsidiary.name}, </#if> <#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?has_content> ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?replace(br_string, comma_space_string)}, </#if> <#else> ${companyinformation.companyname}, <#if companyinformation.addresstext?has_content> ${companyinformation.addresstext?replace(br_string, comma_space_string)}, </#if> </#if> <#if record.subsidiarytaxregnum?has_content && record.subsidiarytaxregnum?length != 0> <#list subsidiary.taxregistration as taxreg> <#if taxreg?is_first> ${taxreg.taxregistrationnumber@label} <#break> </#if> </#list> : ${record.subsidiarytaxregnum} <#else> <#if preferences.subsidiaries> ${subsidiary.federalidnumber@label}: ${subsidiary.federalidnumber} <#else> ${companyinformation.employerid@label}: ${companyinformation.employerid} </#if> </#if> /
</#if>
pdf.body:
<#assign br_string="
"><#assign comma_space_string=", "><#assign number_format="#,##0.00">


	

      Invoice No: ${record.tranid}
      
  	
	

</#if>${record.trandate@label}: ${nsformat_date(record.trandate)}
${record.duedate@label}: ${nsformat_date(record.duedate)}
${record.terms@label}: ${record.terms}
	
	
	
${record.total@label}
${record.currencysymbol} ${record.total?string[number_format]}
	
	<#if !paymentlinktext.printinginhtml && record.paymentlink?length != 0>
	














${paymentlinktext.qrcodetext}
	</#if>
	
	

	${record.billaddress@label}:
<#if !record.entity.isperson> ${record.entity.companyname} <#else> <#if record.entity.salutation?has_content>${record.entity.salutation} </#if> <#if record.entity.firstname?has_content>${record.entity.firstname} </#if> <#if record.entity.lastname?has_content>${record.entity.lastname}</#if> </#if>
${record.billaddress}
	${record.shipaddress@label}:
${record.shipaddress}
	
<#if record.item?has_content>



	
<#list record.item as item><#if item?is_first>
	${item.item@label}
	${item.description@label}
	${item.quantity@label}
	${item.rate@label}
	${item.amount@label}
	<#break></#if></#list>

<#list record.item as item>

	${item.item}
	${item.description}
	${nsformat_number(item.quantity)}
	${item.rate?string[number_format]}
	${item.amount?string[number_format]}
	
	</#list>



	${record.subtotal@label}
	${record.subtotal?string[number_format]}
	
	<#if !record.discounttotal?is_nan && record.discounttotal != 0>
	

	${record.discounttotal@label}
	${record.discounttotal?string[number_format]}
	
	</#if><#attempt><#if record.shippingcost?has_content && !record.shippingcost?is_nan && record.shippingcost gt 0>
	

	${record.shippingcost@label}
	${record.shippingcost?string[number_format]}
	
	</#if><#recover></#attempt><#attempt><#if record.tax2total?has_content && !record.tax2total?is_nan && record.tax2total gt 0>
	

	${record.tax2total@label}
	${record.tax2total?string[number_format]}
	
	</#if><#recover></#attempt>
	

	${record.taxtotal@label}
	${record.taxtotal?string[number_format]}
	
	<#attempt><#if record.giftcertapplied?has_content && !record.giftcertapplied?is_nan && record.giftcertapplied lt 0>
	

	${record.giftcertapplied@label}
	${record.giftcertapplied?string[number_format]}
	
	</#if><#recover></#attempt>
	

	${record.total@label}
	${record.currencysymbol} ${record.total?string[number_format]}
	
</#if><#if paymentlinktext.printinginhtml>



	 
	 
	
	

	
	
${paymentlinktext.contactinfoheader}
${paymentlinktext.emaillabel}${(preferences.subsidiaries)?then(subsidiary.email, companyinformation.email)}
${paymentlinktext.phonelabel}${(preferences.subsidiaries)?then(subsidiary.fax, companyinformation.fax)}
	
	<#if record.paymentlink?length != 0>
	
${paymentlinktext.paymentlinkheader}
${paymentlinktext.paymentlinkfootertext}
	</#if>
	
	

	 
	
	

	<#if preferences.subsidiaries><#if subsidiary.legalname?length != 0>${subsidiary.legalname},  <#else> ${subsidiary.name},  </#if> <#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?has_content> ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?replace(br_string, comma_space_string)},  </#if> <#else> ${companyinformation.companyname},  <#if companyinformation.addresstext?has_content> ${companyinformation.addresstext?replace(br_string, comma_space_string)},  </#if> </#if> <#if record.subsidiarytaxregnum?has_content && record.subsidiarytaxregnum?length != 0> <#list subsidiary.taxregistration as taxreg> <#if taxreg?is_first> ${taxreg.taxregistrationnumber@label} <#break> </#if> </#list> : ${record.subsidiarytaxregnum} <#else> <#if preferences.subsidiaries> ${subsidiary.federalidnumber@label}: ${subsidiary.federalidnumber} <#else> ${companyinformation.employerid@label}: ${companyinformation.employerid} </#if> </#if>
	
</#if>
